answers.author: Casey Cichowicz
answers.text:
Hello - to join a group, just make sure you're signed in to the site, and visit the group page (in this case, http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/groups/group/1152) and click the "join this group" link on the right hand side of the page.

author: Michael O'Leary
text: How to I join the Northwest NextGen Group? I do not see a place to click to get added to the list.
title: Joining Group
